subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The pedigrees of the Devils’ coaches — Peter DeBoer and his assistants Larry Robinson and Adam Oates — give the team some confidence as it seeks to even its series against Los Angeles.
snippet: The pedigrees of the Devils’ coaches — Peter DeBoer and his assistants Larry Robinson and Adam Oates — give the team some confidence as it seeks to even its series against Los Angeles.
